author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Week of December 21, 2018
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins Six disclosures since last week, with four issues unfixed. View this week's vulnerable plugins list. I won't be doing a report next week due to the holidays.  I'll...
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

Six disclosures since last week, with four issues unfixed.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.

I won’t be doing a report next week due to the holidays.  I’ll send out a two-week report the first Friday of 2019.
